p.codeblock: Future<void> setSubscribeVideoBlocklist( {required List<int> uidList, required int uidNumber});
public abstract int SetSubscribeVideoBlocklist(uint[] uidList, int uidNumber);

section.p: You can call this method to specify the video streams you do not want to subscribe to.
You can call this method to specify the video streams you do not want to subscribe to.
You can call this method to specify the video streams you do not want to subscribe to.
You can call this method to specify the video streams you do not want to subscribe to.

ul.li: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
The video subscription blocklist is not affected by , , or autoSubscribeVideo in .
After setting the blocklist, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the channel.
If a user is in both the audio subscription allowlist and blocklist, only the blocklist takes effect.
You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
The video subscription blocklist is not affected by , , or autoSubscribeVideo in .
After setting the blocklist, if you leave and rejoin the channel, the blocklist remains effective.
If a user is in both the audio subscription blocklist and allowlist, only the blocklist takes effect.
You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
The video subscription blocklist is not affected by , , or the autoSubscribeVideo setting in .
After setting the blocklist, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the channel.
If a user is in both the audio subscription blocklist and allowlist, only the blocklist takes effect.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
The video subscription blocklist is not affected by , , or autoSubscribeVideo in .
After setting the blocklist, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the channel.
If a user appears in both the audio subscription blocklist and allowlist, only the blocklist takes effect.

plentry.pd: The user ID list for the video subscription blocklist. If you want to block the video stream from a specific user, add that user's ID to this list. If you want to remove a user from the blocklist, you need to call the method again to update the list so that it no longer includes the uid of the user you want to remove.
The number of users in the blocklist.

User ID list of the video subscription blocklist. If you want to exclude a specific user's video stream from being subscribed to, add that user's ID to this list. To remove a user from the blocklist, you need to call the method again and update the user ID list to exclude the uid of the user you want to remove.
The number of users in the blocklist.

The user ID list of the video subscription blocklist. If you want to unsubscribe from the video stream of a specific publishing user, add that user's ID to this list. If you want to remove a user from the blocklist, you need to call the method again to update the user ID list of the subscription blocklist so that it no longer contains the uid of the user you want to remove.
The number of users in the blocklist.

The list of user IDs in the video subscription blocklist. If you want to block the video stream from a specific user, add the user's ID to this list. To remove a user from the blocklist, you need to call again to update the list so that it no longer includes the user's uid.
The number of users in the video subscription blocklist.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: 0: Success.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
0: Success.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: 0: Success.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
